attributes.action: allow the band "Iron Maiden" play at the opening or closing ceremony of the Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The band Iron Maiden was formed in London in 1975, and remain to be one of the most successful and well known British Artist worldwide.
We, the undersigned feel that a band of this caliber should finally be recognized by their own country, and feel that they should be a part of an event as prestigious as the Olympic Games.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Olympic Games Organising Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
